Introduction

Uhyeong is a South Korean singer. He is best known as a member of the disbanded group D.I.P and a member of the group XENEX.

After D.I.P's disbandment in 2018, he, Taeha, and B.Nish (now going by Bon) re-debuted in a group called XENEX.
